name: .WCLD2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .WCLD2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A WCLD2 file contains a saved word cloud created by WordClouds.com, an online program for generating custom word clouds. It stores all of the information about the word cloud, including a list of words, font, colors, shape, text shadows, and spacing. When a user saves a word cloud, WordClouds.com automatically downloads information about it as a WCLD2 file; users can upload the file to the site to open it.

content: WordClouds.com specializes in creating word clouds in different shapes, colors, and sizes. Examples of when you might create a word cloud include describing a loved one, classroom rules, and business values.
After creating a word cloud, you can export it as an image or video for sharing purposes. You can also order it as a canvas or framed print through the service.
NOTE: WordClouds.com replaced classic.wordclouds.com, which saves word clouds as .WCLD files.

instructions: You can open a WCLD2 file with WordClouds.com using a web browser. For example, to open a WCLD2 file, select File â†’ Open (.wcld2).
